Payment Timing

Analysis of Chorley's 17,212 transactions reveals distinct payment patterns:

  • Busiest day: Wednesday — 10,692 payments totalling £121M
  • Quietest day: Weekend payments are minimal as expected
  • Rapid payers: 11 suppliers are paid within an average of 14 days
  • Clock-like regularity: 2 suppliers receive payments at near-identical intervals (e.g. The Alderley Hotel at 4.4-day average intervals)

Round Numbers

Our analysis flagged 229 payments over £5,000 that were exact round numbers (e.g. £10,000.00, £50,000.00), totalling £8.4 million. While round-number payments aren't inherently suspicious — grants, fixed fees, and budget transfers often use round figures — they can sometimes indicate estimated rather than invoice-based payments.

Explore payment patterns on our Spending page.
